meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jody Clark Barb Hougas Joel Pool Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6383.

td.p: Jody Clark, a retail associate from Garretson, South Dakota
Barb Hougas, a pharmacist originally from Denison, Iowa
Joel Pool, a real estate developer from Oakland, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $48,400)

tr.td: IT'S OPENING NIGHT ON BROADWAY!
MORE THAN ONE MEANING
TV LOCATIONS
FRANKLY
MADEIRA
I DON'T GIVE A...
(Alex: Each correct response will end with the letters "A-M".)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'On Sept. 25, 1979 Patti LuPone sang "Don\'t Cry For Me Argentina" in this Hal Prince-directed musical at the Broadway Theatre')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Joel
Barb
Jody

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Revealing Joel\'s response] Again, you didn\'t put the verb in. You--you have an aversion to verbs.)
[Laughter]
BarbWhat is the Komodo dragon?
$3,000
JoelWhat Tasmanian devil
$10,600
JodyWhat is Komodo dragon
$10,100
Tasmanian devil')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
